verbs.description: [ARG0: sniper ambush] [V: kills] [ARG1: 5 officers] injures 7 in dallas following peaceful protest in what authorities called a sniper ambush on police officers at the end of a peaceful protest against nationwide dallas police department mayor rawlings micah xavier johnson dallas county texas dallas dallas police association david brown massachusetts
